title.narrative: IR 103 ALL HEALTH FACILITIES IN TARGET D

description.narrative: All health facilities in target districts have capacity to provide antiretroviral drugs to reduce mother to child transmission of HIV by 2015, which contributes to Child Health, Health Systems Strengthening, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Maternal And Newborn Health, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, mothers and pregnant women benefit from high impact interventions contributing to the attainment of MDG targets for child and maternal survival and development.
